p: The collection of the coastal, salt marsh species, Culicoides furens (Poey), with a UV trap in the Riverbanks Zoo was unexpected. Adults of this species in the US Virgin Islands might be carried by prevailing winds for at least 6.4 km over low mountains (366 m) ( Williams 1962), and adults in Panama could be carried up to 3.2 km by winds ( Breeland and Smith 1962).
